justification: Unauthenticated backend access allows impersonation, leading to high damage. Attackers can exploit misconfigured endpoints (moderate reproducibility) and impact all users (high affected users).
recommendations: Implement strict authentication for backend access; Enforce role-based access controls; Monitor and log unauthorized access attempts

justification: Unsanitized input enables code injection, causing severe damage. Attackers can easily reproduce attacks (high reproducibility) and exploit vulnerabilities in processing logic.
recommendations: Implement input validation and sanitization; Use content security policies; Regularly audit input handling mechanisms

justification: Unencrypted storage exposes sensitive data. Attackers can access plaintext files (moderate reproducibility) and exploit this for data theft (high impact).
recommendations: Encrypt sensitive data at rest; Implement access controls for storage systems; Use secure file permissions and encryption standards

threat_title: Denial of Service via Resource Exhaustion
justification: Resource exhaustion attacks can disrupt service availability. Attackers can overwhelm the backend (moderate reproducibility) and exploit lack of rate limiting.
recommendations: Implement rate limiting and request throttling; Monitor system resource usage; Use auto-scaling for handling traffic spikes
